meanings.definition: A person who pretends to be something they are not, especially in order to impress others.
meanings.sent1: The group of poseurs at the party tried to act like they were famous celebrities.
meanings.sent2: The poseurs in the school always wore designer clothes to show off.
meanings.sent3: The poseurs at the talent show pretended to be expert dancers but tripped over their own feet.
meanings.sent4: The poseurs in the office were like chameleons, changing their personalities to fit in with different groups.
meanings.sent5: The image of the poseurs pretending to be royalty was both amusing and sad.
